title: Baked apples
ingredients: ['6 apples - peeled, cored and sliced', '100g (4 oz) demerara sugar', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '100g (4 oz) sultanas', '60g (2 oz) chopped walnuts', '110ml (4 fl oz) whole milk']
